content.rendered:
This past week, we hosted our Unlimited Staging Environments Webinar with special guest Eric Osterman from Cloud Posse. In case you missed it, we’ve recorded it for you to view on demand. During this session, you’ll learn how to run complete, disposable apps on Kubernetes for Staging and Development.

Watch the webcast and learn how Erik has taken a 12-factor app with lots of microservices and leveraged Helm, Codefresh, and Kubernetes so that every time an engineer does a ‘git commit’ an environment is spun up, or updated just for that branch.

He shares the pipeline, use cases, and runs a live demo.

View FULL WEBINAR HERE

You may also view the slides below or download them on SlideShare

Unlimited Staging Environments from Codefresh

 
 

New to Codefresh? Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!
